subject: Prototype Review & Next Steps
content:
Prototype Review Meeting

Attendees: James Wilson (SVP Ops), Amanda Rodriguez (CTO), Robert Kim (CISO)

Prototype Feedback:
- Successfully demonstrated account inquiry automation
- 85% containment rate in testing
- CTO approves technical architecture

Security Review:
- CISO Robert requires SOC 2 Type 2 certification
- Data residency must be US-based
- Standard security questionnaire to complete

Next Steps:
- Move to contracting
- Complete security questionnaire
- Target contract signature: mid-February
- Kickoff implementation: March 1

James: 'We're committed to making this happen Q1'
